feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Table settings updates by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15527
  • Validate handlebars by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15552
  • Relationship field - make sure selected value correctly displays by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15553
  • Add tests for cron stopping. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15566
  • Test cron removal. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15569

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.11...3.4.12

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Convert builder components helpers to ts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15564
  • store koa sessions in redis instead of cookies by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15575

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.12...3.4.13

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Automation Orchestrator refactor. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15546
  • Fix getting proper contexts when validating datasources by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15580
  • Fix CouchDB datasource. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15584
  • Improve APM traces around automations. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15586

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.13...3.4.14

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix loops being given empty strings. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15589

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.14...3.4.15

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.4.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Validate js helpers by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15578
  • [Revert] store koa sessions in redis instead of cookies by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15596

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.4.15...3.4.16
